assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: HH and The Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia are equity holders in Nobias Therapeutics Inc., developing MEK inhibitor therapy for complex lymphatic anomalies. Other authors declare no competing interests.

group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia Institutional Review Board approved a registry and biorepository study (PI YD). Informed consent was obtained from all participants as required by the IRB.
